title: Gadgetmobile
desc:
The Gadgetmobile is Gadget's trusty car that he uses when he is on cases in nearly every episode of Inspector Gadget. It closely resembles a [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2138890807]DeLorean[/url].

Adds the Gadgetmobile to the game as an additional police vehicle.

Go-Go Gadgetmobile!

[h1]Languages[/h1]
English
